Company Profile


Modern Engineering is an established CNC machining organization.
It specializes in short term production and ongoing production
work.




Full profile

Full profile

Company description

Country of Ownership:
Canada
Year Established:
1939
Exporting:
Yes
Primary Industry (NAICS):
332710 - Machine Shops
Primary Business Activity:
Manufacturer / Processor / Producer
Total Sales ($CDN):
$1,000,000 to $4,999,999
Export Sales ($CDN):
$200,000 to $499,999

Product / Service / Licensing

Service Name:
CNC Machining / Subcontract Manufacturing

top of page

Technology profile

Modern has an FMS (flexible manufacturing system) which is two
horizontal milling machines attached to a 28 pallet sytems. This
allows any one of these pallets to be radomly loaded into the
machine. Each pallet,when setup, requires no further setups at
all so that production of any given product in the cell can be
call up at any time. This allows Modern to respond quickly to
its customers with repeating product requests. Modern also has a
Zeiss CNC coordinate measuring machine and full time programing
capability.

					Technology profile
				




                         
    
      
            Modern has an FMS (flexible manufacturing system) which is two 
horizontal milling machines attached to a 28 pallet sytems. This 
allows any one of these pallets to be radomly loaded into the 
machine. Each pallet,when setup, requires no further setups at 
all so that production of any given product in the cell can be 
call up at any time. This allows Modern to respond quickly to 
its customers with repeating product requests. Modern also has a 
Zeiss CNC coordinate measuring machine and full time programing 
capability.
